commit message:
Removed what I believe to be a deprecated dependency in app/build.gradle.
Updated build.gradle and gradle properties to support AS 2.0 and Instant Run.

Revert 'Removed what I believe to be a deprecated dependency in app/build.gradle.'

This reverts commit c42b52c0660eb8eafd3f07cc37204de879df5a0f.

Add longest streak / longest break to ShowTrackActivity

Closes #32

Add description to multiple entries settings

Fixes #80

Restores previously selected Group across app sessions.

- Moved track header & group spinner to new TickHeader class, to better encapsulate header logic
- Added TickHeaderListener interface for TickHeader to notify components of group selection changes
- Added TickmateConstants for values that might be shared across classes

Merge pull request #81 from abvanpelt/restart-app-with-previous-group

Restart app with previous group
